__e: We were wrong to keep his illness from you. But you understand why it's important the others don't know.
You want everybody to know about your father, is that it?
No, I just don't want everyone finding out if I don't get in...
Oh, I can't tell you who he is, but that's for your own protection, in case they come and question you.
No, I just don't want everyone finding out if I don't get in...
And them coming to live here now, that wasn't easy for you, I know.
So I say let them come!
So let them bring on All their problems
Why don't you think other people come here?
I want them here so I get first drop.
There's no purpose in them coming after you here.
- No, I don't want them coming along on this trip anymore.
Well, in that case, yeah, I guess we can still go out if you don't mind the boys tagging along.
I want just six of you to come with me.
Afraid they'll turn out like me.
And I say, "so now I want them to come out."
As I understand, there's quite a lot you've done online you don't want to have come out.
I'm sure you have such a good view of it all from your pulpit.
Whenever they feel able to talk, Please come to us, to me.
Instead of waiting for them to come to us... We've been going to them!
